trans-unit.source: Stores all the data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: Az összes adatot tárolja szerializálható vagy objektum deszerializálásához szükséges objektum szükséges.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály nem örökölhető.

trans-unit.source: This class is used by objects with custom serialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály az egyedi szerializálás viselkedő objektumai használják.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> method on either <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> or <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate> populates the SerializationInfo store with the name, type, and value of each piece of information it wants to serialize.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>metódus akár <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>vagy <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate>tölti fel a SerializationInfo tároló a nevét, típusát és értékét az szerializálni szeretnének adat.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the appropriate function can extract this information.
trans-unit.target: Deszerializálás során a kívánt függvényt nyerhet ki ezt az információt.

trans-unit.source: Objects are added to the SerializationInfo store at serialization time using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AddValue%2A> methods and extracted from the SerializationInfo store at deserialization using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.GetValue%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Objektumok adhatók hozzá a szerializálási idő az SerializationInfo áruházat a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AddValue%2A>módszerek és a deszerializálás az SerializationInfo tároló kinyert a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.GetValue%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.GetValue%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AddValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about customizing serialization, see [Custom Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Szerializálási testreszabásával kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [egyéni szerializálási](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy új példányt a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter> passed as the `converter` parameter converts data from its internal representation to the form the user requested.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter>átadása pedig a `converter` paraméter adatokat alakítja át a belső alakból a képernyőn a felhasználónak a kért.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter>

trans-unit.source: The internal representation of the data within the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> depends on the formatter that created it.
trans-unit.target: A belső <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>függ tőle létrehozó formázó</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> belüli adatok ábrázolása

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>az objektum szerializálása.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter"></xref> used during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter"> </xref> deszerializálása során.

trans-unit.source: type or converter is .
trans-unit.target: typeor converter is .

trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>az objektum szerializálása.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter"> </xref> deszerializálása során.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the object requires same token in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy szükséges-e az objektum ugyanezt a tokent részlegesen megbízható kapcsolat.

trans-unit.source: Adds a Boolean value into the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> store.
trans-unit.target: A logikai értéket ad a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> tárolja.

trans-unit.source: If two values are added with names that differ only by case, no exception will be thrown, which is not a recommended practice.
trans-unit.target: Ha két értéket ad hozzá a nevét, amely kizárólag eltérőek eset, nincs kivételt fog jelezni, amely nincs ajánlott.

trans-unit.source: However, adding two values with the exact same name will cause the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Azonban két értékének pontos ugyanazzal a névvel, akkor a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>jelezni, hogy.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# void ISerializable.GetObject(SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context) { // This will not cause an exception to be thrown. info.AddValue("ABC", true); info.AddValue("abc", false); // However, this will cause the SerializationException to be thrown. info.AddValue("XYZ", true); info.AddValue("XYZ", false); } ``` ```vb# Private Sub GetObjectData(ByVal info As SerializationInfo, _ ByVal context As StreamingContext) ' This will not cause an exception to be thrown. info.AddValue("ABC", "upper case") info.AddValue("abc", "lower case") ' However, this will cause the SerializationException to be thrown. info.AddValue("XYZ", "same case") info.AddValue("XYZ", "same case") End Sub ```
trans-unit.target: Példa:```c# void ISerializable.GetObject(SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context) { // This will not cause an exception to be thrown. info.AddValue("ABC", true); info.AddValue("abc", false); // However, this will cause the SerializationException to be thrown. info.AddValue("XYZ", true); info.AddValue("XYZ", false); } ``` ```vb# Private Sub GetObjectData(ByVal info As SerializationInfo, _ ByVal context As StreamingContext) ' This will not cause an exception to be thrown. info.AddValue("ABC", "upper case") info.AddValue("abc", "lower case") ' However, this will cause the SerializationException to be thrown. info.AddValue("XYZ", "same case") info.AddValue("XYZ", "same case") End Sub ```

trans-unit.source: The object contained in the `value` parameter is serialized as the type returned by `value`.
trans-unit.target: Az objektum szerepel a `value` paraméter által visszaadott típus szerint szerializált `value`.

trans-unit.source: If the data stored in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> is of the type requested (or one of its derived classes), that value is returned directly.
trans-unit.target: Ha az adatok tárolódnak a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>van a kért típus (vagy annak származtatott osztályok egyikét), ezt az értéket ad vissza közvetlenül.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter.Convert%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to convert it to the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: Ellenkező esetben <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter.Convert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>konvertálnia kell a megfelelő típust nevezzük.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter.Convert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the GetValue method can always be safely cast to the type specified in the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A GetValue metódus által visszaadott érték is mindig biztonságosan konvertálható a megadott típus a `type` paraméter.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Type> of the object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Beállítja a <xref:System.Type>az objektum szerializálása.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter> is responsible for setting the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> instance before passing it to <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>A <xref:System.Type> <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>példány előtt <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> </xref:System.Type> felelős</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>

trans-unit.source: However, users who want to send proxies for their objects will need to change the type represented by this <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: Azonban felhasználók, akik szeretne küldeni az objektumok proxyk kell módosítani a típusát, ez által képviselt <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>példány.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: Using the SetType method is equivalent to setting both the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Megegyezik a SetType metódussal a beállítás mind a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A>és a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A>
